name: CRAZ'D!
description:
A 2009 platform exploration game, mostly inspired by freeware games I had consumed in my youth.

This game suffers from general unfairness, lazy level and boss design, and a lack of mechanics.

I was inspired to improve upon the concept by developing the follow-up, 2.

A playthrough was done by raocow, which is probably more entertaining than the game itself.
